item.title: Welcome
item.author: rouke@broersma.dev (Rouke Broersma)
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I don’t know what to do with this yet..

item.title: About me
item.author: rouke@broersma.dev (Rouke Broersma)
item.description: Hi! My name is Rouke Broersma. I’m a software developer and open source enthousiast. My day-to-day involves developing the dotnet developer experience platforms provided to coworkers and customers at Info Support. In my free time I work on Stryker, the mutation testing platform for dotnet. Currently my main focus area is azure infrastructure (as code). Go Bicep!
